title: 3v3 ranked
body:
Hey, so me and my friends want to play 3v3 ranked against other teams, but when you go to  the options to play normal or ranked twisted treeline, ranked is not an option. Is there a reason that we can not play ranked? 
- Thank you

replies.body:
Ranked team queues are only available during certain times. The [current schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) for NA is from 4:00 to 10:00 pm PDT on weekdays and 2:00 to 10:00 pm PDT on weekends.

Additionally, you might need to make a team first before you can see the ranked team queue. There should be an option on your profile page in the client, next to your summoner name.

Ranked Team play is only enabled during specific hours when the peak of these matches are played. You can find the schedule [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule).

Let me know if you have any questions.
